content:
BaseVsaEngine Class

Definition

Implements IJSVsaEngine interface.

In this Article

[System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because it is being deprecated in Visual Studio 2005; there will be no replacement for this feature. Please see the ICodeCompiler documentation for additional help.")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("F8932A50-9127-48B6-B115-2BFDC627CEE3")]
public abstract class BaseVsaEngine : Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaEngine
Inheritance
System.Object
BaseVsaEngine

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Fields

applicationPath

Gets or sets the application path.

protected string applicationPath;

assemblyVersion

Gets or sets the assembly version.

protected string assemblyVersion;

compiledRootNamespace

Gets or sets the compiled root namespace.

protected string compiledRootNamespace;

engineMoniker

Gets or sets the engine moniker.

protected string engineMoniker;

engineName

Gets or sets the engine name.

protected string engineName;

engineSite

Gets or sets the engine site

protected Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaSite engineSite;

errorLocale

Gets or sets the error locale.

protected int errorLocale;

executionEvidence

Gets or sets the execution evidence.

protected System.Security.Policy.Evidence executionEvidence;

failedCompilation

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the compilation failed.

protected bool failedCompilation;

genDebugInfo

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether debug information is generated.

protected bool genDebugInfo;

haveCompiledState

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether there is a compiled state.

protected bool haveCompiledState;

isClosed

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the engine is closed.

protected bool isClosed;

isDebugInfoSupported

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether debug information is supported.

protected bool isDebugInfoSupported;

isEngineCompiled

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the engine is compiled.

protected bool isEngineCompiled;

isEngineDirty

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current in-memory representation of the item differs from the persisted representation.

protected bool isEngineDirty;

isEngineInitialized

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the engine is initialized.

protected bool isEngineInitialized;

isEngineRunning

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the engine is running.

protected bool isEngineRunning;

loadedAssembly

Gets or sets the loaded assembly.

protected System.Reflection.Assembly loadedAssembly;

nameTable

Gets or sets the name table.

protected static System.Collections.Hashtable nameTable;

rootNamespace

Gets or sets the root namespace.

protected string rootNamespace;

scriptLanguage

Gets or sets the script language.

protected string scriptLanguage;

startupClass

Gets or sets the startup class.

protected Type startupClass;

startupInstance

Gets or sets the startup instance.

protected Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.BaseVsaStartup startupInstance;

vsaItems

Gets or sets the collection of IVsaItem objects.

protected Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItems vsaItems;

Properties

AppDomain

Gets or sets the application domain.

public _AppDomain AppDomain { get; set; }
Value
_AppDomain

The application domain.

ApplicationBase

Gets or sets the application base.

public string ApplicationBase { get; set; }
Value
String

The application base.

Assembly

Gets a reference to the running assembly generated by Run method.

public System.Reflection.Assembly Assembly { get; }
Value
Assembly

Reference to the currently running assembly.

Evidence

Provides evidence for the purpose of validating the current object's identity.

public System.Security.Policy.Evidence Evidence { get; set; }
Value
Evidence

Returns a reference to an Evidence object.

GenerateDebugInfo

Sets or gets a Boolean value that signifies whether the script engine produces debug information when the Compile method is called.

public bool GenerateDebugInfo { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true to produce debug information; otherwise, false.

IsCompiled

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the source is compiled.

public bool IsCompiled { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the source is compiled; otherwise, false.

IsDirty

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current in-memory representation of the item differs from the persisted representation.

public bool IsDirty { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the in-memory representation differs from the persisted representation; otherwise, false.

IsRunning

Gets a Boolean value that reports whether the engine is currently in run mode.

public bool IsRunning { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the engine is in run mode; otherwise, false.

Items

Gets the collection of IJSVsaItem objects, which represent all items added to the engine.

public Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItems Items { get; }
Value
IJSVsaItems

The collection of items.

Language

Gets the name of the programming language supported by the engine.

public string Language { get; }
Value
String

The name of the programming language.

LCID

Gets or sets the geographical locale and language in which to report exception messages.

public int LCID { get; set; }
Value
Int32

An integer value representing the locale in which exception messages are to be reported.

Name

Sets or gets the display name of the engine.

public string Name { get; set; }
Value
String

The name of the engine.

RootMoniker

Sets or gets a script engine's root moniker.

public string RootMoniker { get; set; }
Value
String

The root moniker of the engine.

RootNamespace

Sets or gets the root namespace used by the engine.

public string RootNamespace { get; set; }
Value
String

The namespace of the engine.

Site

Sets or gets the host-implemented IJSVsaSite object that is used by the engine to communicate with the host.

public Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaSite Site { get; set; }
Value
IJSVsaSite

The host-implemented object.

Version

Gets the current version of the language compiler supported by the engine, in the form Major.Minor.Revision.Build.

public string Version { get; }
Value
String

The current version.

Methods

Close()

Closes the engine.

public virtual void Close ();

Compile()

Causes the engine to compile the existing source state.

public virtual bool Compile ();
Returns
Boolean

true on successful compilation; otherwise, false.

DoClose()

Closes the engine.

protected abstract void DoClose ();

DoCompile()

Causes the script engine to compile the existing source state.

protected abstract bool DoCompile ();
Returns
Boolean

true on successful compilation; otherwise, false.

DoLoadSourceState(IJSVsaPersistSite)

Directs the engine to load source items.

protected abstract void DoLoadSourceState (Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaPersistSite site);
site
IJSVsaPersistSite

The site from which the specified source items are loaded.

DoSaveCompiledState(Byte[],Byte[])

Saves the compiled state of the script engine; optionally, it also saves debugging information.

protected abstract void DoSaveCompiledState (out byte[] pe, out byte[] debugInfo);
pe
Byte[]

The compiled state of the engine.

debugInfo
Byte[]

Specifies debugging information contained in the .PDB file.

DoSaveSourceState(IJSVsaPersistSite)

Directs the script engine to persist its source state to the specified object.

protected abstract void DoSaveSourceState (Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaPersistSite site);
site
IJSVsaPersistSite

The site to which source state is saved.

Error(JSVsaError)

Returns an error.

protected Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaException Error (Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaError vsaErrorNumber);
vsaErrorNumber
JSVsaError

The error number to be returned.

Returns
JSVsaException

An exception with the specified error number.

GetCustomOption(String)

Gets implementation-specific options for the engine.

protected abstract object GetCustomOption (string name);
name
String

The name of the option to get.

Returns
System.Object

The value of the option.

GetOption(String)

Gets implementation-specific options for the engine.

public virtual object GetOption (string name);
name
String

The name of the option to get.

Returns
System.Object

The value of the option.

InitNew()

Provides a notification that the initialization phase is complete.

public virtual void InitNew ();

IsValidIdentifier(String)

Checks whether the supplied identifier is valid for the engine.

public abstract bool IsValidIdentifier (string ident);
ident
String

A string value provided as identifier.

Returns
Boolean

true if the identifier is valid; otherwise, it returns false.

IsValidNamespaceName(String)

Checks whether the supplied namespace is valid for the engine.

protected abstract bool IsValidNamespaceName (string name);
name
String

A string value provided as identifier.

Returns
Boolean

true if the namespace is valid; otherwise, it returns false.

LoadCompiledState()

Loads the compiled state.

protected virtual System.Reflection.Assembly LoadCompiledState ();
Returns
Assembly

The compiled state.

LoadSourceState(IJSVsaPersistSite)

Directs the engine to load source items from their point of persistence, as specified by the host-provided object.

public virtual void LoadSourceState (Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaPersistSite site);
site
IJSVsaPersistSite

The site from which the specified source items is loaded.

Preconditions(BaseVsaEngine+Pre)

Sets the precondition flags.

protected void Preconditions (Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.BaseVsaEngine.Pre flags);
flags

The flags to set.

Reset()

Removes the engine from the running state and disconnects automatically bound event handlers.

public virtual void Reset ();

ResetCompiledState()

Resets the compiled state.

protected abstract void ResetCompiledState ();

RevokeCache()

Invalidates the cached assembly for the engine, as specified by its root moniker.

public virtual void RevokeCache ();

Run()

Initiates execution of compiled code in the engine and binds all event handlers

public virtual void Run ();

SaveCompiledState(Byte[],Byte[])

Saves the compiled state of the engine; optionally, it also saves debugging information.

public virtual void SaveCompiledState (out byte[] pe, out byte[] debugInfo);
pe
Byte[]

The compiled state of the script engine.

debugInfo
Byte[]

Specifies debugging information contained in the .PDB file corresponding to the PE (portable executable).

SaveSourceState(IJSVsaPersistSite)

Directs the engine to persist its source state.

public virtual void SaveSourceState (Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaPersistSite site);
site
IJSVsaPersistSite

The site to which source state is saved.

SetCustomOption(String,Object)

Sets implementation-specific options for the engine.

protected abstract void SetCustomOption (string name, object value);
name
String

The name of the option to set.

value
System.Object

The value for the option being set.

SetOption(String,Object)

Sets implementation-specific options for the engine.

public virtual void SetOption (string name, object value);
name
String

The name of the option to set.

value
System.Object

The value for the option being set.

ValidateRootMoniker(String)

Validates the root moniker.

protected virtual void ValidateRootMoniker (string rootMoniker);
rootMoniker
String

The root moniker to validate.
